update user_money_info

m = #{m,jdbcType=REAL},

mapper.insert:
insert into user_money_info
id,
uid,
m,
enterprise_id,
add_date,
from_id,
pos,
salary,
allowance,
subsistence,
basic,
higher,
keep_salary,
other_wages,
subsidy,
other,
all_salary,
salary_date,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{m,jdbcType=REAL},
#{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fromId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{salary,jdbcType=REAL},
#{allowance,jdbcType=REAL},
#{subsistence,jdbcType=REAL},
#{basic,jdbcType=REAL},
#{higher,jdbcType=REAL},
#{keepSalary,jdbcType=REAL},
#{otherWages,jdbcType=REAL},
#{subsidy,jdbcType=REAL},
#{other,jdbcType=REAL},
#{allSalary,jdbcType=REAL},
#{salaryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
SELECT '1' AS gzlxId, a.id, a.uid, a.salary_date AS gzffsj, d.c_code AS zzjgdm, d.id as qyid, d.`name` AS qymc, CASE WHEN d.pro_id = 0 THEN '私企' WHEN d.pro_id = 1 THEN '国企' WHEN d.pro_id = 2 THEN '外企' WHEN d.pro_id = 3 THEN '合资' ELSE '其它' END qyxz, b.pnum AS sfz, b.`name` AS xm, a.all_salary AS gzze FROM user_bmoney_info a INNER JOIN user_info b ON b.id=a.uid INNER JOIN hy_business_info c ON c.user_id = b.id INNER JOIN enterprise_info d ON d.id = c.enterprise_id
WHERE a.del_date IS NULL AND b.del_date IS NULL AND c.del_date IS NULL AND d.del_date IS NULL AND d.is_order = 1
and d.c_code like CONCAT('%',#{zzjgdm},'%')
and d.name like CONCAT('%',#{qymc},'%')
and d.pro_id=#{qyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b.pnum like CONCAT('%',#{sfz},'%')
and b.name like CONCAT('%',#{xm},'%')
and a.salary_date>=CONCAT(#{startdate},' 00:00:00')
and a.salary_date<=CONCAT(#{enddate},' 23:59:59')
UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS gzlxId, a.id, a.uid, a.salary_date AS gzffsj, d.c_code AS zzjgdm, d.id as qyid, d.`name` AS qymc, CASE WHEN d.pro_id = 0 THEN '私企' WHEN d.pro_id = 1 THEN '国企' WHEN d.pro_id = 2 THEN '外企' WHEN d.pro_id = 3 THEN '合资' ELSE '其它' END qyxz, b.pnum AS sfz, b.`name` AS xm, a.all_salary AS gzze FROM user_money_info a INNER JOIN user_info b ON a.uid = b.id INNER JOIN hy_business_info c ON c.user_id = b.id INNER JOIN enterprise_info d ON d.id = c.enterprise_id
WHERE a.del_date IS NULL AND b.del_date IS NULL AND c.del_date IS NULL AND d.del_date IS NULL AND d.is_order = 1
and d.c_code like CONCAT('%',#{zzjgdm},'%')
and d.name like CONCAT('%',#{qymc},'%')
and d.pro_id=#{qyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b.pnum like CONCAT('%',#{sfz},'%')
and b.name like CONCAT('%',#{xm},'%')
and a.salary_date>=CONCAT(#{startdate},' 00:00:00')
and a.salary_date<=CONCAT(#{enddate},' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY gzffsj desc

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.salary_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS gzffsj, c.`name` AS qymc,
case when c.pro_id=0 then '私企' when c.pro_id=1 then '国企' when c.pro_id=2 then '外企' when c.pro_id=3 then '合资' else '其它' end qyxz, b.`name` AS xm, b.sex AS xb, b.pnum AS sfz, a.salary AS gzxd, a.allowance AS gwjt, a.subsistence AS shbt, a.basic AS jcjx, a.higher AS gcjx, a.keep_salary blgz, a.other_wages AS qtgz, a.subsidy AS tzbt, a.other AS qt, c.c_code AS zzjgdm, a.all_salary AS gzze FROM user_money_info a INNER JOIN user_info b ON a.uid = b.id INNER JOIN enterprise_info c ON c.id = a.enterprise_id
